name: Flappy 2048 Threes! - The Greatest Games All-In-One!
name_original: Flappy 2048 Threes! - The Greatest Games All-In-One!
description:
**FREE FOR LAUNCH OF APP**

Flappy 2048 Threes! Implements all three games into one.
Love the Original Flappy Bird? But also love to play 2048? Why not have a decorated Flappy Bird game with 2048 Decals? Sounds awesome doesn't it?!
